name: Dogenstein 3D
description:
In another world Captain Blazkowitz failed his mission in killing General Strasse. The Generals continuous experimentation on his "loyal" dogs has resulted in them mutating. Maybe even beyond his control...

accouple of years later. His loyal dogs betrayed him... taking control of the entire Nazi army which meant they have the worlds strongest army under their control...Renaming it "The Dazis".

Kill Mutated dogs in this spinoff on the First Ever FPS Game "Wolfenstein 3D"! A submission for the 32Bit Game Jam!

Schools been abit harsh this year thats why the game might be incomplete :(. Although i do plan on finishing this project!
